purpose: To outline the approach and elements involved in defining a Target State vision using the CEP Model.
title: Defining the Target State

bullets.text: Developed a Target State vision based on the CEP Model and tailored to the bank’s unique culture
Defined 8 principles that encompass the values and initiatives of CEP, in the clients’ words and signed by First Interstate executives
Transformed the Target State vision into a strategic Roadmap that became the execution playbook for Phases 2 and 3, including:
Immediate opportunities to address First Interstate’s specific client experience pain points

reasoning_strategy: Logical sequencing of steps involved in defining the Target State.

content_zones.left: Textual content outlining Target State, Guiding Principles, and Roadmap

design_language: Professional and structured with emphasis on phases

新增欄位._why_unknown: Font details are unknown due to image quality.
